list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Control devices shall comply with ISO 10968. Placement shall be in accordance with ISO 6682.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: In addition, ISO 9355-1, ISO 9355-2, ISO 9355-3 and ISO 9241 (all parts) should be used as for guidance.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: Where there is more than one operator's position for controlling the drilling process, the rig shall be provided with a mode selector to intentionally select the control position which shall be used.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: When a control is designed and constructed to carry out several functions, e.g. keyboard control, the activated operation shall be clearly identified.

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: The on-board control devices on the control station shall be located so that the operator cannot reach the rotating parts or a two-hand control device shall be used.

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: If two-hand control devices are used, they shall comply with ISO 13851.

list-item.label: g)
list-item.p: Accidental actuation of the controls shall be prevented when such actuation can cause a hazard.
